ygData.subject: Stagnation Flow Flame

Hi,

I want to compute an axisymmetric premixed flame against an inert
stag=
nation surface. I tried starting with the python interface
using a Stagnati=
onFlow object

  sim =3D StagnationFlow(gas =3D gas, grid =3D initial_grid)=
 

I can set the inflow boundary conditions via 
  sim.inlet.set(mdot =3D m=
dot, T =3D tinlet, X =3D comp1)
However, I have no idea how I can set prope=
r boundary conditions
for the inert stagnation surface. I studied Stagnatio=
nFlow.py
but I cannot find any member function to, e.g., set boundary
condi=
tions for temperature and composition (fixed value or zero
gradient). How c=
an I set/prescribe those values? Or does anyone
has already a script doing =
this problem (catcomb.py is not
exactly what I want as it has surface chemi=
stry. However, I am
trying to adopt it for my purpose but failed so far).

=

Thanks for help

Michael Oevermann
